translated: the hermaphrodite, the neuter, and the one with two organs,🔽are mentioned in order.🔽The one with three organs, the one with three sexual organs,🔽the one with two sexual organs, and the one with one sexual organ,

original: 4 ` / tri linggy'a ntri shvi ti pa dam mi thu ne tu dva yo ri ti //🔽ni shiddha linggam pesh'artham tvant'a th'a di na p'urbba bh'a ka /

analyzed: 5 ` / sva ra bya ya dbye byas min gcig lhag min //
translated: The one with two sexual organs is not divided, nor is the one with one sexual organ.

original: rim pa ma rtogs 'dres pa min //
analyzed: rim pa ma rtogs 'dres pa min //

original: rtags gsum pa la gsum zhes tshig / gnyis la 'khrig ces rtags bkag pa //
analyzed: rtags gsum pa la gsum zhes tshig / gnyis la 'khrig ces rtags bkag pa //
translated: and the one with one sexual organ is said to have one.🔽The one with a hidden sexual organ is said to have a hidden meaning, and the one with no sexual organ is said to have no meaning.

original: lhag ma'i don yin du mtha' dang // aa tha dang po snga cha min //
analyzed: lhag ma'i don yin du mtha' dang // aa tha dang po snga cha min //

original: nan tar nges par brtan pos kyang //
analyzed: nan tar nges par brtan pos kyang //

analyzed: sems yod rnams la gsum kar 'byung//

original: syu rnna bha sya proo shtha pa da bh'a dra bh'a dra pa d'a ssa m'a: //🔽sy'a d'a shvi na ai sho py'a shvo yu dzo bi thub dpo zla'o //

translated: and the absence of rage,🔽are the mental actions.🔽The absence of wrong views,

original: mi thy'a dri shtirn'a sti ka t'a by'a p'a do dro ha tsinta nam //
analyzed: mi thy'a dri shtirn'a sti ka t'a by'a p'a do dro ha tsinta nam //
translated: the absence of malice, and the absence of violence,

original: sa moo * //
analyzed: sa moo * //
translated: are the mental actions.🔽The absence of envy,🔽the absence of avarice,🔽and the absence of deceit,🔽are the mental actions.🔽The absence of pride,🔽the absence of conceit,🔽and the absence of arrogance,

original: bgrang dang rnam par dpyod //
analyzed: bgrang dang rnam par dpyod //
translated: are the mental actions.🔽The absence of anger,🔽the absence of hatred,🔽and the absence of rage,🔽are the mental actions.🔽The absence of wrong views,🔽the absence of malice, and the absence of violence,🔽are the mental actions.🔽The absence of envy,🔽the absence of avarice,🔽and the absence of deceit,🔽are the mental actions.🔽The absence of pride,🔽the absence of conceit,

original: lhag par dpyod dang rtog ge dang // rtog dang the tsom som nyi dang // nem nur dang ni yid gnyis dang // de nas mtshungs pa gtan phebs des //
analyzed: lhag par dpyod dang rtog ge dang // rtog dang the tsom som nyi dang // nem nur dang ni yid gnyis dang // de nas mtshungs pa gtan phebs des //
translated: and the absence of arrogance,🔽are the mental actions.🔽The absence of anger,🔽the absence of hatred,🔽and the absence of rage,🔽are the mental actions.🔽The absence of wrong views,

original: log par lta ba med pa pa //
analyzed: log par lta ba med pa pa //
translated: the absence of malice, and the absence of violence,🔽are the mental actions.🔽The absence of envy,🔽the absence of avarice,🔽and the absence of deceit,🔽are the mental actions.🔽The absence of pride,🔽the absence of conceit,🔽and the absence of arrogance,🔽are the mental actions.🔽The absence of anger,

original: gnod sems 'tshe bar sems pa dang // mtshungs pa grub siddh'anta r'ardh'antoo bhr'antirmmi thy'a ma tirbhra ma: //
analyzed: gnod sems 'tshe bar sems pa dang // mtshungs pa grub siddh'anta r'ardh'antoo bhr'antirmmi thy'a ma tirbhra ma: //
translated: the absence of hatred,🔽and the absence of rage,🔽are the mental actions.🔽The absence of wrong views,🔽the absence of malice, and the absence of violence,🔽are the mental actions.🔽The absence of envy,🔽the absence of avarice,🔽and the absence of deceit,🔽are the mental actions.🔽The absence of pride,🔽the absence of conceit,

original: sa bi d'a g'u: pra ti dzny'a nam ni ya m'a shra ba sam shra b'a: //
analyzed: sa bi d'a g'u: pra ti dzny'a nam ni ya m'a shra ba sam shra b'a: //
translated: and the absence of arrogance,🔽are the mental

original: aam g'i ka r'a bhyu pa ga ma pra ti shra ba sa m'a dha ya: //🔽moksho dh'irdzny'a na ma n+ya tra bi dzny'a nam shilpa sastra yo: //
analyzed: aam g'i ka r'a bhyu pa ga ma pra ti shra ba sa m'a dha ya: // moksho dh'irdzny'a na ma n+ya tra bi dzny'a nam shilpa sastra yo: //
translated: The Amogha-karam-bhupa-gama-pratisthara-samadhi,🔽The Mokso-dhi-jnanamanya-tra-vijnana-shilapashtraya,🔽🔽

original: mtha' bzung ba'i sems //
analyzed: mtha' bzung ba'i sems //
translated: The mind that is limited,

original: 'khrul pa log shes nor ba'i sems //🔽khas len phyogs bzung dam bca' dang // nges pa mnyan bya yang dag thos //
analyzed: 'khrul pa log shes nor ba'i sems // khas len phyogs bzung dam bca' dang // nges pa mnyan bya yang dag thos //
translated: The mind that is deluded, mistaken, and confused,🔽The mind that is biased, partial, and dogmatic,🔽The mind that is certain, attentive, and receptive,🔽The mind that is possessive, grasping, and clinging,

original: bdag gir byas dang khas blangs dang // so sor mnyan bya ting nge 'dzin //🔽thar dang blo dang shes pa gzhan //
analyzed: bdag gir byas dang khas blangs dang // so sor mnyan bya ting nge 'dzin // thar dang blo dang shes pa gzhan //
translated: The mind that is meditative, focused, and absorbed,🔽The mind that is liberated, intelligent, and wise,🔽The mind that is conscious, creative, and scholarly.🔽Liberation, non-action, nirvana, bliss, nectar,

original: rnam shes bzo dang bstan bcos so//🔽mukti kee ba lya nirbb'a na shre yo ni: shre ya s'a mri tam //🔽moksho& pa barggo& th'a dzny'a na ma bi dy'a hamma ti: stri y'am //
analyzed: rnam shes bzo dang bstan bcos so// mukti kee ba lya nirbb'a na shre yo ni: shre ya s'a mri tam // moksho& pa barggo& th'a dzny'a na ma bi dy'a hamma ti: stri y'am //
translated: Liberation, freedom from bondage, knowledge, wisdom, and understanding,

original: r'u pam shapdo ra sa sparsha gandh'ashtsa bi sha y'a aa m'i //🔽go tsa r'a aindri y'arth'ashtsa hri sh'i grol ba ma 'dres mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: r'u pam shapdo ra sa sparsha gandh'ashtsa bi sha y'a aa m'i //🔽go tsa r'a aindri y'arth'ashtsa hri sh'i grol ba ma 'dres mya ngan 'das //
translated: Form, sound, smell, taste, touch, and mental objects,🔽The sense faculties, the sense objects, and the sense consciousnesses,

original: rab bsngags nges legs 'chi med dang // thar pa dang ni spangs pa'o //
analyzed: rab bsngags nges legs 'chi med dang // thar pa dang ni spangs pa'o //
translated: liberation, and abandonment.🔽Then ignorance, non-knowledge,

original: de nas mi shes ma rig dang // bdag gi blo gros mo yin no //
analyzed: de nas mi shes ma rig dang // bdag gi blo gros mo yin no //
translated: and the mind of self.🔽Form, sound, taste, touch,🔽and smell are the objects.

original: gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang reg / dri ste 'di rnams yul rnams so //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang reg / dri ste 'di rnams yul rnams so //
translated: The sense faculties are the objects of experience,🔽and the objects are the subjects.

original: sbyod yul dang ni dbang don dang // yul can @139b kam bi sha y'indra yam //
analyzed: sbyod yul dang ni dbang don dang // yul can @139b kam bi sha y'indra yam //
translated: Karma, smell, and taste are the faculties of action,🔽and the mind is the faculty of knowledge.

original: karme ndri yantu p'a yv'a di ma no ne tr'a di dh'i ndri yam //
analyzed: karme ndri yantu p'a yv'a di ma no ne tr'a di dh'i ndri yam //
translated: The eye, etc. are the faculties of knowledge,🔽and the tongue is bitter.

original: tu ba ra sta k'a sh'a yo& st'i ma dhu ro la ba na: ka tu: //
analyzed: tu ba ra sta k'a sh'a yo& st'i ma dhu ro la ba na: ka tu: //
translated: The nose is pungent,🔽and the body is sharp and astringent.

original: tikto& amlashtsa ra s'a: pum si tadba t+su sha ta pi tri shu //
analyzed: tikto& amlashtsa ra s'a: pum si tadba t+su sha ta pi tri shu //
translated: The ear is sweet,

original: bi mardonthe pa ri ma lo gandhe dza na ma no ha re //
analyzed: bi mardonthe pa ri ma lo gandhe dza na ma no ha re //
translated: and the mind is all tastes.🔽The objects are form, sound,🔽taste, touch, and smell.🔽The faculties are the faculties of action,

original: yul dang dbang po dang // las kyi dbang po kha la sogs //
analyzed: yul dang dbang po dang // las kyi dbang po kha la sogs //
translated: such as the mouth, etc.

original: yid dang mig sogs blo yi dbang //
analyzed: yid dang mig sogs blo yi dbang //
translated: The mind and the eye, etc. are the faculties of knowledge.

original: chu rten bska ba mo min no //
analyzed: chu rten bska ba mo min no //
translated: The tongue is not bitter.

original: mngar dang lan tshva tsha ba dang // kha dang skyur dang ro rnams ni //
analyzed: mngar dang lan tshva tsha ba dang // kha dang skyur dang ro rnams ni //
translated: bitter, sour, and astringent are the six tastes.

original: skyes bu de ldan drug po 'ang gsum //
analyzed: skyes bu de ldan drug po 'ang gsum //
translated: A person possessing these six is also threefold.

original: rnam nyed sbyar sbos dri dang ni //
analyzed: rnam nyed sbyar sbos dri dang ni //
translated: Fragrance, smell, and odor are the three kinds of smell.🔽The fragrance that captivates the minds of people is the best.

original: skye bo'i yid 'phrog kun a'a mo da: so ti nirh'a r'i b'a tsya lingga tva m'a gu n'a ta //🔽sa m'a karshi tu nirh'a r'i su ra bha ghr'a na tarppa n'a: //
analyzed: skye bo'i yid 'phrog kun a'a mo da: so ti nirh'a r'i b'a tsya lingga tva m'a gu n'a ta // sa m'a karshi tu nirh'a r'i su ra bha ghr'a na tarppa n'a: //
translated: The fragrance that spreads far and wide is the most excellent.🔽This fragrance, that good fragrance, that desirable fragrance,

original: aishta gandha: su gandhi: sy'a d'a mo d'i mu kha b'a sa na: //🔽p'u ti gandhi stu durggandho bi shram sy'a d'a ma gandhi yata//
analyzed: aishta gandha: su gandhi: sy'a d'a mo d'i mu kha b'a sa na: // p'u ti gandhi stu durggandho bi shram sy'a d'a ma gandhi yata//
translated: that sweet fragrance, that bad fragrance, that foul fragrance,🔽that white fragrance, that pure fragrance, that desirable fragrance,

original: ` // shukla shu bhra shu mos dang // ring 'gugs brjod bya'i yon tan min //
analyzed: ` // shukla shu bhra shu mos dang // ring 'gugs brjod bya'i yon tan min //
translated: that long-inviting fragrance is not a quality to be expressed.

original: mtshungs pa 'bod byed ring du khyab //
analyzed: mtshungs pa 'bod byed ring du khyab //
translated: The equal-inviting fragrance spreads far.🔽The good fragrance satisfies the nose and is a desirable fragrance.

original: dri bzang sna tshim 'dod dri dang // dri zhim legs 'thul kha la chags //🔽rul dri dang ni dri ngan no //
analyzed: dri bzang sna tshim 'dod dri dang // dri zhim legs 'thul kha la chags // rul dri dang ni dri ngan no //
translated: The sweet fragrance is attached to the mouth.🔽The foul fragrance is the bad fragrance.

original: mi gtsang ba dang bsur dri'o//
analyzed: mi gtsang ba dang bsur dri'o//
translated: The foul smell is the bad smell.🔽The bad smell is the foul smell.

original: ` // dkar po dag byed dkar gsal tsi shve ta bi sha da shya ta p'anda r'a: //
analyzed: ` // dkar po dag byed dkar gsal tsi shve ta bi sha da shya ta p'anda r'a: //
translated: White, purifying, white-shining, Tsisheveta, Vishashyata, Pandara.

original: aa ba d'a ta: si to goo ra ba laksho dha ba lo& rdzu na: //
analyzed: aa ba d'a ta: si to goo ra ba laksho dha ba lo& rdzu na: //
translated: Avadatta, Sita, Goravaksha, Uddhava, Arjuna.

original: ha ri na p'andu ra: p'andu r'i shatp'andustu dh'u sa ra: //
analyzed: ha ri na p'andu ra: p'andu r'i shatp'andustu dh'u sa ra: //
translated: Harina, Pandura, Pandurashta, Pandustushasara.

original: krishne n'i l'a si ta shy'a ma k'a la shy'a ma la me tsa k'a: //
analyzed: krishne n'i l'a si ta shy'a ma k'a la shy'a ma la me tsa k'a: //
translated: Krishna, Nili, Lasi, Tashayama, Kalashayama, Lameshchaka.

original: dang // mdog dkar gzhan gcod dkar snum dang // skya bsangs dag mdog yid sdebs dang // mdog dkar mig stobs dkar dang sgrub //
analyzed: dang // mdog dkar gzhan gcod dkar snum dang // skya bsangs dag mdog yid sdebs dang // mdog dkar mig stobs dkar dang sgrub //
translated: White, other-cutting, white-shining, and yellowish, with a pleasing complexion,🔽white-complexioned, thousand-eyed, white, and accomplished.

original: skya ser ser skya dkar skya'o //
analyzed: skya ser ser skya dkar skya'o //
translated: Pale yellow, yellowish-white, and white.

original: cung skya dang na 'ol kha'o //
analyzed: cung skya dang na 'ol kha'o //
translated: Slightly pale, and reddish.🔽Blue, dark blue, not white,

original: nag po sngon po dkar min dang // sngo bsangs mdog nag gnag lhang dang // @140a * //
analyzed: nag po sngon po dkar min dang // sngo bsangs mdog nag gnag lhang dang // @140a * //
translated: dark blue, dark-complexioned, and dark.

original: p'i too goo ro ha ri dr'a bha: pa l'a sho ha ri to ha ri ta//
analyzed: p'i too goo ro ha ri dr'a bha: pa l'a sho ha ri to ha ri ta//
translated: Paitoda, Gorohari, Drava, Palasha, Harita, Harita.

original: ` // ro hi to lo hi to rakta sho na: ko ka na datstsha bi: //
analyzed: ` // ro hi to lo hi to rakta sho na: ko ka na datstsha bi: //
translated: Rohita, Lohita, Rakta, Shona, Kokana, Tshashvi.

original: aa byagta r'a gastva ru na: shve ta raktastu p'a ta la: //🔽shya ba sy'arka pi so dh'u mra dh'u ma loo * //🔽ser po ser shang yung nga mdog //🔽ljang gu ljang ser lo ma'i mdog /🔽` // dmar po le brgan khrag gi mdog / dmar ba autpal dmar po dang // mi gsal dmar rtsa skya rengs mdog / dkar dmar 'dres pa dmar skya'o //🔽ser nag dang ni nag ser ro //
analyzed: aa byagta r'a gastva ru na: shve ta raktastu p'a ta la: // shya ba sy'arka pi so dh'u mra dh'u ma loo * // ser po ser shang yung nga mdog // ljang gu ljang ser lo ma'i mdog / ` // dmar po le brgan khrag gi mdog / dmar ba autpal dmar po dang // mi gsal dmar rtsa skya rengs mdog / dkar dmar 'dres pa dmar skya'o // ser nag dang ni nag ser ro //
translated: The yellow is the yellow of the turmeric plant, the red is the red of the lac plant, the white is the white of the water lily, the black is the black of the sesame seed.🔽🔽The yellow-red is the color of the turmeric flower, the red-yellow is the color of the lac flower.🔽🔽The red is the red of the red lotus, the reddish is the color of the red-tinged dawn, the white-red is the color of the mixture of white and red.🔽🔽The black-yellow and the yellow-black are the same.🔽

original: dmar nag dud krishna lo hi te //🔽ka d'a ra: ka pi la: pidga pi sam goo ka dru pidg'a loo //🔽tsi tram kirm'i ra kalm'a sha sha ba lee t'ashtsa karbu re //🔽gu ne shukl'a da ya: pum si gu ni lim g'astu tadba ti://🔽` // sho n'i sho n'a tha pi sarm'i pidga ka mtshun kha'o //

original: gser mdog ser skya skyer kha dang // dkar ser dur kha gi wang mdog / sna tshogs zal po 'dres ma dang // khra bo kha dog sna tshogs pa //
analyzed: gser mdog ser skya skyer kha dang // dkar ser dur kha gi wang mdog / sna tshogs zal po 'dres ma dang // khra bo kha dog sna tshogs pa //
translated: variegated, spotted, mixed, and multicolored.

original: yon tan dkar po la sogs pho //
analyzed: yon tan dkar po la sogs pho //
translated: The qualities are white and so forth.

original: yon tan rtags can de ldan 'gyur//
analyzed: yon tan rtags can de ldan 'gyur//
translated: One who possesses them has the signs of qualities.

original: ` // dkar dmar ma dang dmar dkar ma //
analyzed: ` // dkar dmar ma dang dmar dkar ma //
translated: White and red, red and white,

original: de nas l'a ha ri ni tvi yam //
analyzed: de nas l'a ha ri ni tvi yam //
translated: then Lā, Hari, Ni, Tviyam,

original: ha ri tee n'itta ta thee t'ashye n'i shye t'a mi t'a tsa s'a //
analyzed: ha ri tee n'itta ta thee t'ashye n'i shye t'a mi t'a tsa s'a //
translated: Hari, Te, I, Ttat, The, Tashi, Yena, Shi, Yeta, Am, I, Taca,

original: n'i lee bastre b'a n'a mni n'i l'i pr'a ni ni tsoo sha dhoo //
analyzed: n'i lee bastre b'a n'a mni n'i l'i pr'a ni ni tsoo sha dhoo //
translated: Ni, Lei, Vastra, Vā, Nam, Ni, Lā, Prā, Ni, Nicho, Shadho,

original: ro hi n'i ro hi t'a rakt'a lo hi n'i lo hi t'a tsa s'a //
analyzed: ro hi n'i ro hi t'a rakt'a lo hi n'i lo hi t'a tsa s'a //
translated: Rohini, Rohitā, Rakta, Lohini, Lohitā, Ca,🔽Sa, Lohitī, Kā, Lohini,🔽white, yellow, red, yellow,

original: lo hi ti k'a lo hi ni dkar ser dmar ser ma //🔽dkar ser ma ni ljang mo'i tshul //
analyzed: lo hi ti k'a lo hi ni dkar ser dmar ser ma // dkar ser ma ni ljang mo'i tshul //
translated: white, yellow, green,🔽similarly, variegated, multicolored,

original: de bzhin sna tshogs khra mo dang // sngo ljang ma yang de yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin sna tshogs khra mo dang // sngo ljang ma yang de yin no //
translated: blue, green, and also that.

original: n'i la gos kyi ming nyid dam //
analyzed: n'i la gos kyi ming nyid dam //
translated: Nila is the name of a cloth,🔽or Nila is an animal, a physician,

original: n'i l'i srog chags sman pa dag / dmar mo ro hi t'a dang ni //
analyzed: n'i l'i srog chags sman pa dag / dmar mo ro hi t'a dang ni //
translated: red, Rohitā,

original: ro hi n'i dang lo hi n'i //
analyzed: ro hi n'i dang lo hi n'i //
translated: Rohini and Lohini,🔽and likewise Lohita.🔽Lohitaka is the color of attachment,

original: de bzhin lo hi t'a yang ngo //🔽lo hi ti k'a chags mdog gam //
analyzed: de bzhin lo hi t'a yang ngo // lo hi ti k'a chags mdog gam //
translated: and Lohini is the color of anger.🔽The language of the Brahmins is Bharata,🔽and the speech of the gods is called Vâk.🔽The speech of the Asuras is called Asura,🔽and the speech of the Gandharvas is called Gandharva.🔽The speech of the Yakshas is called Yaksha,🔽and the speech of the Rakshasas is called Raksasa.🔽The speech of the Kinnaras is called Kinnara,🔽and the speech of the Uragas is called Uraga.

original: lo hi ni @140b k'a r'a ga ta ko p'a di n'a pi b'a//
analyzed: lo hi ni @140b k'a r'a ga ta ko p'a di n'a pi b'a//
translated: The speech of the human beings is called human,🔽and the speech of the non-human beings is called non-human.🔽The speech of the gods is called divine,🔽and the speech of the non-gods is called non-divine.🔽The speech of the Brahmins is called Brahmin,🔽and the speech of the non-Brahmins is called non-Brahmin.

original: ` // bra hm'i tu bh'a ra t'e bh'a sh'a g'irb'agb'a n'i sa ra svat'i //
analyzed: ` // bra hm'i tu bh'a ra t'e bh'a sh'a g'irb'agb'a n'i sa ra svat'i //
translated: The speech of the Kshatriyas is called Kshatriya,🔽and the speech of the non-Kshatriyas is called non-Kshatriya.

original: by'a h'a ra auktirla pi tam bh'a shi tam ba tsa nam ba tsa: //
analyzed: by'a h'a ra auktirla pi tam bh'a shi tam ba tsa nam ba tsa: //
translated: The speech of the Vaishyas is called Vaishya,🔽and the speech of the non-Vaishyas is called non-Vaishya.🔽The speech of the Shudras is called Shudra,

original: aa pa bhram sho& pa shapda: syatstsh'a stre sabda stu b'a tsa ka: //
analyzed: aa pa bhram sho& pa shapda: syatstsh'a stre sabda stu b'a tsa ka: //
translated: and the speech of the non-Shudras is called non-Shudra.

original: ting su banta tsa k'a khros mdog ste //
analyzed: ting su banta tsa k'a khros mdog ste //
translated: The speech of the women is called feminine,

original: de sogs skyes pa'i rtags kyang yin//
analyzed: de sogs skyes pa'i rtags kyang yin//
translated: and the speech of the men is called masculine.

original: ` // tshangs byung bh'a ra ta yi skad //
analyzed: ` // tshangs byung bh'a ra ta yi skad //
translated: The speech of the neuter is called neuter,🔽and the speech of the non-neuter is called non-neuter.🔽The speech of the young is called youthful,🔽and the speech of the old is called aged.🔽The speech of the middle-aged is called middle-aged,🔽and the speech of the non-middle-aged is called non-middle-aged.

original: sgra dang brjod pa dbyangs can dang // tha snyad gsung dang smra ba dang // gtam dang lo rgyus tshig ces bya //🔽zur chag dang ni sgra nyams pa //
analyzed: sgra dang brjod pa dbyangs can dang // tha snyad gsung dang smra ba dang // gtam dang lo rgyus tshig ces bya // zur chag dang ni sgra nyams pa //
translated: The speech of the learned is called learned,🔽and the speech of the unlearned is called unlearned.🔽The speech of the wise is called wise,🔽and the speech of the unwise is called unwise.🔽The speech of the noble ones is called noble,🔽and the speech of the non-noble ones is called non-noble.

original: rjod byed bstan bcos sgra la ni //🔽ting su pa yi mtha' can yo b'a kyam kri y'a b'a k'a ta k'a nvi t'a //
analyzed: rjod byed bstan bcos sgra la ni //🔽ting su pa yi mtha' can yo b'a kyam kri y'a b'a k'a ta k'a nvi t'a //
translated: The speech of the noble ones is called noble,🔽and the speech of the non-noble ones is called

original: shru ti: str'i be da aamn'a yastra y'i dharmma tu tadbi dhi: //
analyzed: shru ti: str'i be da aamn'a yastra y'i dharmma tu tadbi dhi: //
translated: Sruti, satri, vedanta, amnāya, trayī, dharma, tu, tadvidhiḥ.

original: stri y'a mriks'a ma ya dzush'i ai ti be d'astra yastra y'e: //
analyzed: stri y'a mriks'a ma ya dzush'i ai ti be d'astra yastra y'e: //
translated: Striyā, mṛkṣā, mayajūṣī, iti, vedāḥ, trayas, trayāṇām.

original: shikshe ty'a di shru te rangga mangk'a ra pra na boo sa moo //
analyzed: shikshe ty'a di shru te rangga mangk'a ra pra na boo sa moo //
translated: Śikṣet, ādi, śruta, ṛṅga, mṛṅkāra, pranava, ṣaum.

original: ai ti h'a sa: pu r'a britta mu tshig / bya ba dang ni byad ldan pa //
analyzed: ai ti h'a sa: pu r'a britta mu tshig / bya ba dang ni byad ldan pa //
translated: Iti, hāsāḥ, purā, vṛtta, muṣṭiḥ.

original: thos pa mo'o rig byed man ngag / gsum po de ni chos su sgrub //🔽snyan dang gas nges brjod mchod sbyin lo //
analyzed: thos pa mo'o rig byed man ngag / gsum po de ni chos su sgrub // snyan dang gas nges brjod mchod sbyin lo //
translated: Karma, ca, nirmāṇa, śruti, vedānta, amnāya, trayī, dharma, tu, tadvidhiḥ.

original: 'di gsum rig byed gsum pa yin //🔽bslab sogs thos ....(bslab pa rtog pa /
analyzed: 'di gsum rig byed gsum pa yin // bslab sogs thos ....(bslab pa rtog pa /
translated: Striyā, mṛkṣā, mayajūṣī, iti, vedāḥ, trayas, trayāṇām.

original: nges tshig / brda sprod /🔽sdeb sbyor / skar rtsis/) pa'i yan lag ste //🔽aom yig pra na ba dag mtshungs //
analyzed: nges tshig / brda sprod / sdeb sbyor / skar rtsis/) pa'i yan lag ste // aom yig pra na ba dag mtshungs //
translated: Śikṣet, ādi, śruta, ṛṅga, mṛṅkāra, pranava, ṣaum.

original: sngon rabs sngon du byung ba'o //
analyzed: sngon rabs sngon du byung ba'o //
translated: Iti, hāsāḥ, purā, vṛtta, muṣṭiḥ.

original: au d'a tt'a d'att'ady'a stra ya sva r'a: //🔽a'a nv'i kshi k'i danda n'i t'i tarka bi dy'artha sh'astra yo: //
analyzed: au d'a tt'a d'att'ady'a stra ya sva r'a: //🔽a'a nv'i kshi k'i danda n'i t'i tarka bi dy'artha sh'astra yo: //
translated: Udātta, āttadāyās, trayas, svarāḥ.🔽Ānvīkṣikī, daṇḍanīti, tīrthavida, vidyā, arthāśāstraiḥ.

original: a'a khy'a yi ko pa la bdh'arth'a pu r'a nam panytsa laksha nam //
analyzed: a'a khy'a yi ko pa la bdh'arth'a pu r'a nam panytsa laksha nam //
translated: The Akshapavibhaga, the Arthaviniścaya, the Pancalakshana,

original: pra bandha kalpa n'a ka th'a pra ba hli k'a pra he li k'a: //
analyzed: pra bandha kalpa n'a ka th'a pra ba hli k'a pra he li k'a: //
translated: The Prabandha, the Kalpanamanditikā, the Prahvālikā, the Prahelikā,

original: smri tistu dharmma sam hi sogs gsum dbyangs rnams //
analyzed: smri tistu dharmma sam hi sogs gsum dbyangs rnams //
translated: The Smritis, the Sutras, the Dharmasamuccaya, and so forth, are the three melodies.

original: rtsod pa dang ni chad pa'i lugs //
analyzed: rtsod pa dang ni chad pa'i lugs //
translated: The legal system, the system of punishment,🔽The treatises on logic and the meaning of the Vedas,

original: rtog ge rig don bstan bcos dag / gtso bo'i ngag ni bka' lung ste //
analyzed: rtog ge rig don bstan bcos dag / gtso bo'i ngag ni bka' lung ste //
translated: The principal statements, the oral tradition,

original: sngon bas mtshan nyid lnga yin no //
analyzed: sngon bas mtshan nyid lnga yin no //
translated: And the five characteristics from before.🔽The well-composed, the conceptual, the stories,

original: rab sbyar rtog pa gtam rnams dang // brda yis ston dang go dka'o //
analyzed: rab sbyar rtog pa gtam rnams dang // brda yis ston dang go dka'o //
translated: The teachings through symbols, and the difficult to understand.

original: dran pa chos dang bcas pa rnams//🔽@141a * // ta sa m'a hri tistu sam gra ha: //
analyzed: dran pa chos dang bcas pa rnams// @141a * // ta sa m'a hri tistu sam gra ha: //
translated: The memories, along with the Dharma,

original: sa ma sy'a tu sa ma s'artha kim ba dant'i dza na shru ti: //
analyzed: sa ma sy'a tu sa ma s'artha kim ba dant'i dza na shru ti: //
translated: The completely condensed, and the completely grasped,🔽The same, the similar, the meaning, the kimvadanti, the heard,

original: b'artt'a pra britt'i britt'anta au danta sty'a nga th'a hva ya: //
analyzed: b'artt'a pra britt'i britt'anta au danta sty'a nga th'a hva ya: //
translated: The conduct, the well-spoken, the conduct, the udana, the satya, the anga, the havyah,

original: a'a khyangke aa bhi dh'a nam tsa n'a ma dhe yanytsa n'a ma tsa //
analyzed: a'a khyangke aa bhi dh'a nam tsa n'a ma dhe yanytsa n'a ma tsa //
translated: The aksha, the abhidhana, the canamadhye, the yacanama,

original: hu ti r'a k'a ra * //
analyzed: hu ti r'a k'a ra * //
translated: The huta, the raka, the kara,

original: legs par bsdus dang bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: legs par bsdus dang bsdus pa'o //
translated: well-composed and composed.

original: tshig sdud pa dang bsdus pa'i don //
analyzed: tshig sdud pa dang bsdus pa'i don //
translated: The condensed expression and the condensed meaning.

original: gang zhig brjod dang skye bos thos //
analyzed: gang zhig brjod dang skye bos thos //
translated: That which is expressed and heard by the people.

original: gtam dang lo rgyus kha skong dang // bka' mchid yin te de nas ni //
analyzed: gtam dang lo rgyus kha skong dang // bka' mchid yin te de nas ni //
translated: Conversation, history, supplement, and discourse.

original: ming dang zhes dang mtshan dang ni //
analyzed: ming dang zhes dang mtshan dang ni //
translated: Name, phrase, and syllable.

original: mngon par brjod dang ming du brjod //
analyzed: mngon par brjod dang ming du brjod //
translated: Manifestation, verbal expression, and naming.

original: 'bod pa dang ni skad n'a dr'a nam sam hu tirba hu:bhi kri t'a: //
analyzed: 'bod pa dang ni skad n'a dr'a nam sam hu tirba hu:bhi kri t'a: //
translated: Calling, and sound, and invocation, and cry.

original: bi b'a do bya ba h'a ra: sy'a du ba n+y'a sastu b'admu kham //🔽au ponggh'a ta au d'a h'a ra:sha pa nam sha pa tha:pu m'ana //🔽pra shno& nu yo ga: pritstshva tsa pra ti b'akyo tta re sa me //
analyzed: bi b'a do bya ba h'a ra: sy'a du ba n+y'a sastu b'admu kham // au ponggh'a ta au d'a h'a ra:sha pa nam sha pa tha:pu m'ana // pra shno& nu yo ga: pritstshva tsa pra ti b'akyo tta re sa me //
translated: Disputation, and action, and that which is to be done.

original: mi thy'a bhi yo go& bhy'a khy'a gtong dang // yang dag 'bod pa mang pos bos //
analyzed: mi thy'a bhi yo go& bhy'a khy'a gtong dang // yang dag 'bod pa mang pos bos //
translated: Approaching, and going, and seizing, and taking, and human.

original: rnam par rtsod dang tha snyad dang // nye bar 'god dang smra ba'i sgo //🔽nye bar 'jal dang dper brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par rtsod dang tha snyad dang // nye bar 'god dang smra ba'i sgo //🔽nye bar 'jal dang dper brjod do //
translated: Peaceful, and suitable, and question, and reply, and in order.🔽Uninterrupted, and combined, and in succession, and in sequence.

original: mna' dang gros 'don skyes bu'o //
analyzed: mna' dang gros 'don skyes bu'o //
translated: The oath and the counsel are the man.

original: 'dri dang rjes sbyor shes 'dod do //
analyzed: 'dri dang rjes sbyor shes 'dod do //
translated: The question and the reply are the desire to know.

original: slar smra ba dang lhan cig mtshungs //
analyzed: slar smra ba dang lhan cig mtshungs //
translated: The response is the equal.

original: log par mngon sbyor ngan brjod nam tha mi thy'a bhi sham sa nam //🔽aa bhi sh'a pa: pra n'a da stu shabda: sy'a da nu r'a ga dza //🔽ya sha: k'irtti: sa m'a dzny'a tsasta ba: sto trannu ti: stu ti: //🔽a'a mre di ta dvi stri rukta mutstsee rghushtantu gho sha n'a //🔽k'a ku: stri y'a mbi k'a dang // de nas log smra sun 'byin dang // mngon 'dod legs par smra ba yi //
analyzed: log par mngon sbyor ngan brjod nam tha mi thy'a bhi sham sa nam // aa bhi sh'a pa: pra n'a da stu shabda: sy'a da nu r'a ga dza // ya sha: k'irtti: sa m'a dzny'a tsasta ba: sto trannu ti: stu ti: // a'a mre di ta dvi stri rukta mutstsee rghushtantu gho sha n'a // k'a ku: stri y'a mbi k'a dang // de nas log smra sun 'byin dang // mngon 'dod legs par smra ba yi //
translated: The wrong application is the bad speech.

original: sgra ni rjes chags skyed pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ni rjes chags skyed pa'o //
translated: The curse is the threat.🔽The praise is the expression of affection.

original: snyan dang grags pa yang dag shes //
analyzed: snyan dang grags pa yang dag shes //
translated: The fame and the glory are the perfect knowledge.

original: bstod tshig bkur tshig bsngags pa smra //
analyzed: bstod tshig bkur tshig bsngags pa smra //
translated: The praise and the homage are the eulogy.

original: skyor tshig gnyis gsum brjod pa'o //
analyzed: skyor tshig gnyis gsum brjod pa'o //
translated: The repetition is the double or triple utterance.

original: sgra gsang mthon po skad po che //
analyzed: sgra gsang mthon po skad po che //
translated: The loud voice is the loud cry.🔽The woman is the female.

original: cong skad mo dang rnam 'gyur @141b ro ya: sho ka bh'i ty'a di bhi dhva ne: //
analyzed: cong skad mo dang rnam 'gyur @141b ro ya: sho ka bh'i ty'a di bhi dhva ne: //
translated: the contumely, the contempt, the insult, the abuse, the invective, the reproach,🔽the calumny, the threat, the violence, the insult, the harsh word, the slander, the accusation,🔽the contumely, the contempt, the insult, the abuse, the invective, the reproach,🔽the calumny, the threat, the violence, the insult, the harsh word, the slander, the accusation,🔽the contumely, the contempt, the insult, the abuse, the invective, the reproach,🔽the calumny, the threat, the violence, the insult, the harsh word, the slander, the accusation,🔽the contumely, the contempt, the insult, the abuse, the invective, the reproach,🔽the calumny, the threat, the violence, the insult, the harsh word, the slander, the accusation,

original: aa parnn'a kshe ba nirb'a da pa ri b'a d'a pa b'a da bata //
analyzed: aa parnn'a kshe ba nirb'a da pa ri b'a d'a pa b'a da bata //
translated: the contumely, the contempt, the insult, the abuse, the invective, the reproach,

original: au pa kro sho dzu gups'a tsa kut+s'a nind'a tsa garha ne //🔽p'a ru shya ma ti b'a da: sy'adbhartsha nantva pa ka r'a g'i: //
analyzed: au pa kro sho dzu gups'a tsa kut+s'a nind'a tsa garha ne // p'a ru shya ma ti b'a da: sy'adbhartsha nantva pa ka r'a g'i: //
translated: the calumny, the threat, the violence, the insult, the harsh word, the slander, the accusation,🔽the contumely, the contempt, the insult, the abuse, the invective, the reproach,

original: ya: sa ninda au p'a lambha sta tra sy'atpa dang // mya ngan 'jigs sogs las byung sgra //
analyzed: ya: sa ninda au p'a lambha sta tra sy'atpa dang // mya ngan 'jigs sogs las byung sgra //
translated: the calumny, the threat, the violence, the insult, the harsh word, the slander, the accusation,

original: mi bsngags sdigs tshig nges par rgol //
analyzed: mi bsngags sdigs tshig nges par rgol //
translated: the contumely, the contempt, the insult, the abuse, the invective, the reproach,🔽the calumny, the threat, the violence, the insult, the harsh word, the slander, the accusation,🔽the contumely, the contempt, the insult, the abuse, the invective, the reproach,🔽the calumny, the threat, the violence, the insult, the harsh word, the slander, the accusation,🔽the contumely, the contempt, the insult, the abuse, the invective, the reproach,

original: yongs smod sun 'byin khro tshig dang // gshe dang smod dang brgyad pa dang // rngan phyar dang ni tshig rtsub dang // mngon smra tshig ngan dma' 'bebs tshig / gang de skyon ni nyer dmigs pa //🔽de la yongs su ri bh'a sha nam //
analyzed: yongs smod sun 'byin khro tshig dang // gshe dang smod dang brgyad pa dang // rngan phyar dang ni tshig rtsub dang // mngon smra tshig ngan dma' 'bebs tshig / gang de skyon ni nyer dmigs pa // de la yongs su ri bh'a sha nam //
translated: the calumny, the threat, the violence, the insult, the harsh word, the slander, the accusation,🔽the contumely, the contempt, the insult, the abuse, the invective, the reproach,

original: ta tra tv'a ksh'a ra n'a ya: sy'a d'a kro she mee thu nam pra ti: //
analyzed: ta tra tv'a ksh'a ra n'a ya: sy'a d'a kro she mee thu nam pra ti: //
translated: the calumny, the threat, the violence, the insult, the harsh word, the slander, the accusation,🔽the contumely, the contempt, the insult, the abuse, the inve

original: sy'a d'a bh'a sha na m'a l'a pa: pra l'a ponyanartha kamba tsa: //
analyzed: sy'a d'a bh'a sha na m'a l'a pa: pra l'a ponyanartha kamba tsa: //
translated: Sâdhyâbhâshana-mâlâpaḥ, pralâpo nyarthakambhaṭaḥ.

original: aa nu l'a po mu hurbh'a sho bi l'a pa: pa ri de ba nam //
analyzed: aa nu l'a po mu hurbh'a sho bi l'a pa: pa ri de ba nam //
translated: Anulâpo muhurbhâshô bhilâpaḥ paridevanam.

original: bi pra l'a po bi ro dho kti: sam l'a po bh'a sha nammi tha: //
analyzed: bi pra l'a po bi ro dho kti: sam l'a po bh'a sha nammi tha: //
translated: Vipra-lâpo viruddhâkṣaḥ, samlâpo bhâṣaṇammithaḥ.

original: su pra brjod pa'o //
analyzed: su pra brjod pa'o //
translated: Su-pravarjita.

original: de la g-yo ba gang yin pa //
analyzed: de la g-yo ba gang yin pa //
translated: Among them, what is movement?

original: a'a kro sha ni 'khrig tshig yin //
analyzed: a'a kro sha ni 'khrig tshig yin //
translated: Akroshanî is sexual talk.

original: khams bde dang ni 'dri rmed do //
analyzed: khams bde dang ni 'dri rmed do //
translated: Kshama and paripraśna are about the state of the elements.🔽Lavana is meaningless speech.

original: la ba lo pa don med tshig / rjes su sma ba yang yang sma //
analyzed: la ba lo pa don med tshig / rjes su sma ba yang yang sma //
translated: Anulapa is repeated speech.🔽Bhilâpa is words of grief and lamentation.

original: mya ngan tshig dang gdung ba'i tshig / tshig 'gog 'gal ba brjod pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan tshig dang gdung ba'i tshig / tshig 'gog 'gal ba brjod pa'o //
translated: Vipra-lâpa is contradictory speech.

original: phan tshun brjod dang smra ba'o //
analyzed: phan tshun brjod dang smra ba'o //
translated: Samlâpa is mutual speech and conversation.

original: 'gal ba lnga pa: su ba ca na ma pa l'a pastu ni hna ba: //
analyzed: 'gal ba lnga pa: su ba ca na ma pa l'a pastu ni hna ba: //
translated: The five contradictions are: Subachanam, apalâpa, tûna, hanam.

original: sande sha b'agb'a tsi kam sy'a db'a gbhe d'astu trish'u tta re //
analyzed: sande sha b'agb'a tsi kam sy'a db'a gbhe d'astu trish'u tta re //
translated: Sandesha, vagvacikam, sâdhyâdva-ghebhas, tûttara.

original: au sha t'i b'a ga kaly'a n'i sy'atka ly'a tu shu bh'atmi k'a //
analyzed: au sha t'i b'a ga kaly'a n'i sy'atka ly'a tu shu bh'atmi k'a //
translated: Ushâtivâgakalyâna, sâtkalya, tûshshh-bhatamika.

original: aa tyartha ma dhu ram sh'antvam sam ga tam hri da yam dang ni shen tu bral //
analyzed: aa tyartha ma dhu ram sh'antvam sam ga tam hri da yam dang ni shen tu bral //
translated: The very bad is the bad dharma, the very good is the good dharma.

original: shin tu legs sma legs par brjod //
analyzed: shin tu legs sma legs par brjod //
translated: The very well is the very well said.

original: gsang tshig gsang ba'i gtam dang ni //
analyzed: gsang tshig gsang ba'i gtam dang ni //
translated: The secret is the secret talk.🔽 The letter is the letter, the missive is the missive.

original: tshig gi skyes dang tshig spring dang // ngag gi dbye gsum phyi ma la //
analyzed: tshig gi skyes dang tshig spring dang // ngag gi dbye gsum phyi ma la //
translated: The threefold division of speech is the last.

original: mi dge'i tshig ni sdig pa yin //
analyzed: mi dge'i tshig ni sdig pa yin //
translated: The bad speech is the bad.

original: dge ba'i tshig ni legs pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i tshig ni legs pa'o //
translated: The good speech is the good.🔽 The very pleasant is the very pleasant.🔽 The very peaceful is the very peaceful.

original: shin tu snyan dang zhi ba dang // legs par smra @142a * //
analyzed: shin tu snyan dang zhi ba dang // legs par smra @142a * //
translated: The very well said is the very well said.🔽 The angry is the angry.🔽 The cruel is the cruel.

original: ga ma: // nishthu rampa ru sham gr'a myam tva shl'i lam sri nri tampri ye //
analyzed: ga ma: // nishthu rampa ru sham gr'a myam tva shl'i lam sri nri tampri ye //
translated: The violent is the violent.🔽 The true is the true.

original: sa tyenyatha sam ku la klishte pa ra sba ra sa r'a ha te //
analyzed: sa tyenyatha sam ku la klishte pa ra sba ra sa r'a ha te //
translated: The related is the related.🔽 The distressed is the distressed.🔽 The lost is the lost.

original: lupta barnna pa dam grasta nni rastam tva ri to di tam //
analyzed: lupta barnna pa dam grasta nni rastam tva ri to di tam //
translated: The river is the river.🔽 The water is the water.🔽 The tree is the tree.🔽 The forest is the forest.🔽 The mountain is the mountain.🔽 The village is the village.🔽 The town is the town.🔽 The city is the city.🔽 The country is the country.🔽 The king is the king.🔽 The minister is the minister.🔽 The wife is the wife.🔽 The son is the son.

original: aambu kri * //🔽dang yid la bab //🔽khro ba'i tshig ni tshig rtsub bo //
analyzed: aambu kri * // dang yid la bab // khro ba'i tshig ni tshig rtsub bo //
translated: The daughter is the daughter.🔽 The friend is the friend.🔽 The enemy is the enemy.🔽 The neutral is the neutral.🔽 The superior is the superior.

original: mtshang 'dru ba dang mtshang slong ngo //
analyzed: mtshang 'dru ba dang mtshang slong ngo //
translated: The inferior is the inferior.🔽 The equal is the equal.🔽 The man is the man.🔽 The woman is the woman.🔽 The boy is the boy.🔽 The girl is the girl.🔽 The house is the house.🔽 The field is the field.

original: drang gtam dga' byed bden pa dang // de nas 'gal dang rang tshig 'gal //
analyzed: drang gtam dga' byed bden pa dang // de nas 'gal dang rang tshig 'gal //
translated: and then contradictory, self-contradictory,🔽mutually defeating words,🔽unclear syllables, indistinct words,

original: phan tshun 'joms par byed pa'i tshig / yig 'bru tshig mi gsal dang dig / tshig stabs myur du tam sa nishth'i ba ma baddham sy'a da na rtha kam //
analyzed: phan tshun 'joms par byed pa'i tshig / yig 'bru tshig mi gsal dang dig / tshig stabs myur du tam sa nishth'i ba ma baddham sy'a da na rtha kam //
translated: quickly spoken, and tamasaniṣṭhāvamabaddhaṃsya ādana-rtha-kaṃ.

original: aa naksha ra ma b'a tsyam sy'a d'a ha dantu mri sh'a rtha kam //🔽aa tha mlishta ma bi spashtam bi ta tham tva nri tamwa tsa: //
analyzed: aa naksha ra ma b'a tsyam sy'a d'a ha dantu mri sh'a rtha kam // aa tha mlishta ma bi spashtam bi ta tham tva nri tamwa tsa: //
translated: Anakṣara-māvacyaṃsya ādahanta-mṛṣā-rtha-kaṃ.🔽Atha-mliṣṭa-mavisaṃsphaṭaṃ vitathantatva-nṛta-vacāḥ.

original: sa tyanta th'a mri tam sa mya ga m'u ni tri shu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: sa tyanta th'a mri tam sa mya ga m'u ni tri shu brjod pa'o //
translated: Satya-tantra-mṛta-samya-gāmuni-triṣu-varjitaṃ.

original: chu 'thor gtam dang mchil gtam mo //
analyzed: chu 'thor gtam dang mchil gtam mo //
translated: Jala-tarpaṇa-vacanaṃ ca bāhya-vacanaṃ ca.

original: 'brel med dang ni don med gtam //🔽yi ge med dang brjod bya bral //
analyzed: 'brel med dang ni don med gtam // yi ge med dang brjod bya bral //
translated: Asambaddha-vacanaṃ ca nirarthaka-vacanaṃ ca.🔽A-akṣara-māvacyaṃ ca abhidheya-varjitaṃ ca.

original: don stong tshig dang brdzun don can //
analyzed: don stong tshig dang brdzun don can //
translated: Artha-śūnya-vacanaṃ ca mṛṣā-artha-vacanaṃ ca.

original: de nas mi gsal mi mngon tshig / de nyid med dang slu ba'i tshig / bden dang de bzhin mi slu dang // yang dag 'di rnams tadba ti //

analyzed: bh'a ba zhes pa rig ldan no //

original: de nas a'a bu ka ni pha //
analyzed: de nas a'a bu ka ni pha //

analyzed: rgyal tshab gzhon nu nyid la ni // bhartri d'a ra @143b ra ka: //

original: aa brahma nya me ba dhyoktoo r'a dza shya lastu r'asti ya: //
analyzed: aa brahma nya me ba dhyoktoo r'a dza shya lastu r'asti ya: //

original: aamba m'a t'a tha b'a la shyadb'a s'u r'arya stu m'a ri sha: //🔽aanti k'a bha gi n'i dzyeshth'a ka zhes so //

original: rgyal po bhatt'a ra ko lha //
analyzed: rgyal po bhatt'a ra ko lha //

original: de'i bu mo bha tri d'a ri k'a //
analyzed: de'i bu mo bha tri d'a ri k'a //

original: lha mo gang la dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: lha mo gang la dbang bskur ba //

original: gzhan rnams la ni bhatti n'i //
analyzed: gzhan rnams la ni bhatti n'i //

original: aa brahma n+ya gsod mi byed //
analyzed: aa brahma n+ya gsod mi byed //

original: r'a dza shya la mnga' ris so //
analyzed: r'a dza shya la mnga' ris so //
translated: but Rajashila was killed.

original: aamba ma'o de nas ni //
analyzed: aamba ma'o de nas ni //
translated: Ambamata was killed,

original: b'a su ra ni byis pa'o //
analyzed: b'a su ra ni byis pa'o //
translated: and then Vasura was killed.

original: 'phags pa dag ni m'a ri sha //
analyzed: 'phags pa dag ni m'a ri sha //
translated: The noble one, Marisha,🔽was killed by the king's brother.

original: sring mo che ba aanti k'a / nishth'a nishth'a ni nirba ha nam sa me //
analyzed: sring mo che ba aanti k'a / nishth'a nishth'a ni nirba ha nam sa me //

original: hande hanydze ha l'a hv'a nam n'i tsam tse t'i s'a kh'impra ti //
analyzed: hande hanydze ha l'a hv'a nam n'i tsam tse t'i s'a kh'impra ti //

original: aam ga h'a ronyangga bi kshe po byanydzak'a bhi na yoo sa mo //

translated: The treasure of jewels, the ocean, the lord of the sea-monsters, the pārada.🔽The division of that is the milk ocean, the salt ocean, and another,

original: chu ni mo ste mang po'i tshig / gzhi can dang ni thur du ltung //
analyzed: chu ni mo ste mang po'i tshig / gzhi can dang ni thur du ltung //
translated: The waters, the earth, the many, the various, the rice, the sugar-cane, the sesame,🔽The herbs, the nectar, the life, the existence, the bondage, the lotus, the trembling,🔽The first, the all-

original: 'dod byed 'bru phan nor ldan dang // btung bya chu dang mi 'chi dang // 'tsho byed 'byung byed rten gnas dang // lus 'ching 'dzag dang gso byed dang // rgyas byed @147a * //

translated: The desire-maker, the grain-giver, the wealth-giver, the drink-giver, the water, the immortal, the life-giver, the origin-maker, the support, the abode, the body-binder, the dripper, the healer, the enlarger,

original: to mu kham //
analyzed: to mu kham //
translated: the mouth,

original: aambho& rnna sto ya p'a n'i ya n'i ra ksh'i r'ambu samba ram //
analyzed: aambho& rnna sto ya p'a n'i ya n'i ra ksh'i r'ambu samba ram //
translated: the food, the drink, the protector, the water, the fruit, the assembly,

original: me gha pushpam gha na ra sastri shu dve a'a sya mamma yam //
analyzed: me gha pushpam gha na ra sastri shu dve a'a sya mamma yam //
translated: the cloud, the flower, the cloud, the juice,🔽the three, the two, the maker, the transformation,

original: bhanggasta ram ga a'urmi b'astri y'am b'i tsi ra thormmi shu //🔽ma hat+sd'ullo la kallo * //
analyzed: bhanggasta ram ga a'urmi b'astri y'am b'i tsi ra thormmi shu // ma hat+sd'ullo la kallo * //
translated: the great, the joy, the water, the garland,

original: kun sgo bsnyen byed dang // btang 'gro skyong byed btung bya dang // za byed btung byed bde ba mchog / sprin gyi me tog sprin gyi bcud //
analyzed: kun sgo bsnyen byed dang // btang 'gro skyong byed btung bya dang // za byed btung byed bde ba mchog / sprin gyi me tog sprin gyi bcud //
translated: the all-door, the approach-maker, the giver, the protector, the drink, the eater, the drinker, the supreme bliss, the cloud, the flower, the cloud, the essence,

original: gsum gnyis byed pa rnam 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsum gnyis byed pa rnam 'gyur ro //
translated: the three, the two, the maker, the transformation,

original: dba' rlabs gnyer ma khrem gnyer rim //
analyzed: dba' rlabs gnyer ma khrem gnyer rim //
translated: the wave, the wrinkle, the frown, the series,🔽the great, the joy, the water, the garland,🔽the all-door, the approach-maker, the giver, the protector, the water, the fruit, the assembly,🔽the cloud, the flower, the cloud, the essence,🔽the three, the two, the maker, the transformation,

original: de nas klong dang dpa' chen 'khrug / steng 'phar dang ni rab 'khrug lloo sy'a d'a barttonyambha s'am bhra ma: //
analyzed: de nas klong dang dpa' chen 'khrug / steng 'phar dang ni rab 'khrug lloo sy'a d'a barttonyambha s'am bhra ma: //
translated: the rising up and the great agitation, the waves and the foam.

original: pri shanti bindu pri shat'a: su m'am so bi sru sha: stri ya: //
analyzed: pri shanti bindu pri shat'a: su m'am so bi sru sha: stri ya: //
translated: The priyashanti, the bindus, the prishthas, the sumas, the sovishrushtis, the striyas,

original: ba kr'a ni pu kra bhe d'a: sy'u bhra m'ashtsa dza la nirgga m'a: //
analyzed: ba kr'a ni pu kra bhe d'a: sy'u bhra m'ashtsa dza la nirgga m'a: //
translated: the vakranis, the pukrabhedas, the yushmashchas, the jalaniras,

original: k'u lam ro dhashtsa t'i ranytsa pra t'i ranytsa ta tantri shu //
analyzed: k'u lam ro dhashtsa t'i ranytsa pra t'i ranytsa ta tantri shu //
translated: the kulmas, the rodhas, the chatis, the ranyas, the pratyas, the tantri-shus,🔽the paravaras, the paravratas, the chatis, the patrandas, the yins,

original: p'a r'a b'a re pa r'arbb'a ts'i t'i re p'a tranda yin //
analyzed: p'a r'a b'a re pa r'arbb'a ts'i t'i re p'a tranda yin //
translated: the danta-rams, and the paravaras.🔽The priyashantis, the bindus, the prishthas, the sumas, the sovishrushtis, the striyas,

original: 'khyil can 'khor chu chu 'khor dang // chu yi thigs pa chu 'thor pho //🔽chu yi zer ma mo yin no //
analyzed: 'khyil can 'khor chu chu 'khor dang // chu yi thigs pa chu 'thor pho // chu yi zer ma mo yin no //
translated: the vakranis, the pukrabhedas, the yushmashchas, the jalaniras,🔽the kulmas, the rodhas, the chatis, the ranyas, the pratyas, the tantri-shus,🔽the paravaras, the paravratas, the chatis, the patrandas, the yins,

original: rgyun 'khyog dang ni gya gyu 'gros //🔽yur ba ngang ni rnang ma'o //
analyzed: rgyun 'khyog dang ni gya gyu 'gros // yur ba ngang ni rnang ma'o //
translated: the danta-rams, and the paravaras.

original: 'gram dang 'gog dang chu ngogs dang // 'jug ngogs dang ni chu 'gram gsum //
analyzed: 'gram dang 'gog dang chu ngogs dang // 'jug ngogs dang ni chu 'gram gsum //
translated: The banks, the dams, the riverbanks, the fords, and the three riverbanks,

original: pha rol tshu rol phan tshun ngogs //
analyzed: pha rol tshu rol phan tshun ngogs //
translated: the far bank, the near bank, the opposite banks,

original: de yi bar na danta ram //
analyzed: de yi bar na danta ram //
translated: between them is the danta-ram.

original: dvi po& stri y'a manta r'i pam ya dantarb'a ri nasta ta //
analyzed: dvi po& stri y'a manta r'i pam ya dantarb'a ri nasta ta //
translated: The two rivers, the three continents, the middle region, the end of the world, that.

original: to yotthi tantatpu li nam see ka tam si ka t'am ma yam //🔽ni shadba r'astu dzamb'a la: pam kko& stri sh'a da kardda moo //
analyzed: to yotthi tantatpu li nam see ka tam si ka t'am ma yam // ni shadba r'astu dzamb'a la: pam kko& stri sh'a da kardda moo //
translated: The one who has risen from that place, the one who has gone to the other side, the one who has gone to the end, the one who has gone to the middle.🔽The six directions, the earth, the water, the fire, the air, the space, the consciousness.🔽The six sense bases, the eye, the ear, the nose, the tongue, the body, the mind.

original: dza lotstshv'a s'a: pa r'i b'a h'a: k'u pa kastu bi d'a ra k'a: //
analyzed: dza lotstshv'a s'a: pa r'i b'a h'a: k'u pa kastu bi d'a ra k'a: //
translated: The six sense objects, the visible form, the sound, the smell, the taste, the touch, the phenomena.🔽The six sense consciousnesses, the eye consciousness, the ear consciousness, the nose consciousness, the tongue consciousness, the body consciousness, the mind consciousness.🔽The six defilements, the desire, the hatred, the ignorance, the pride, the doubt, the wrong view.🔽The six perfections, the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, the perfection of wisdom.

original: n'a byantri linggam rgyun lam mo //
analyzed: n'a byantri linggam rgyun lam mo //
translated: The three vehicles, the vehicle of the hearers, the vehicle of the solitary realizers, the vehicle of the great vehicle.🔽The three times, the past, the future, the present.🔽The three realms, the desire realm, the form realm, the formless realm.🔽The three worlds, the world of desire, the world of form, the formless world.

original: chu bo gnyis ldan mo min zhing //
analyzed: chu bo gnyis ldan mo min zhing //
translated: The three roots of non-virtue, the desire, the hatred, the ignorance.

original: bar gling gang la chu 'gram dbus //🔽chu bos nyer bzhag de ni sgang //
analyzed: bar gling gang la chu 'gram dbus // chu bos nyer bzhag de ni sgang //
translated: The three roots of virtue, the faith, the diligence, the mindfulness.🔽The three trainings, the training in higher ethics, the training in higher thought, the training in higher wisdom.

original: bye ma'i ngogs dang bye ma'i thang //
analyzed: bye ma'i ngogs dang bye ma'i thang //
translated: The three vehicles, the vehicle of the hearers, the vehicle of the solitary realizers, the vehicle of the great vehicle.

original: 'bying byed rdzab dang 'dam dang ni //
analyzed: 'bying byed rdzab dang 'dam dang ni //
translated: The three times, the past, the future, the present.🔽The three realms, the desire realm, the form realm, the formless realm.🔽The three worlds, the world of desire, the world of form, the formless world.

original: mo min 'dam dang 'jim pa'o //
analyzed: mo min 'dam dang 'jim pa'o //
translated: The three roots of non-virtue, the desire, the hatred, the ignorance.

original: chu bo sgyur ba chu 'bab pa //🔽bud dang shva zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chu bo sgyur ba chu 'bab pa // bud dang shva zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The three roots of virtue, the faith, the diligence, the mindfulness.🔽The three trainings, the training in higher ethics, the training in higher thought, the training in higher wisdom.

original: gru rab rtags gsum @147b noo t'arye stri y'annoo sta ra ni sta ri: //🔽au du pantu pla ba: ko la: sro tombu sa ra nam sva ta: //
analyzed: gru rab rtags gsum @147b noo t'arye stri y'annoo sta ra ni sta ri: //🔽au du pantu pla ba: ko la: sro tombu sa ra nam sva ta: //
translated: The three vehicles, the vehicle of the hearers, the vehicle of the solitary realizers

original: a'a ta rasta ra pa nyam sy'a ddro n'a k'ashth'ambu b'a hi n'i //
analyzed: a'a ta rasta ra pa nyam sy'a ddro n'a k'ashth'ambu b'a hi n'i //
translated: The boat is the raft, the boatman is the ferryman.

original: s'am ya tri ka: po ta ba ni kka rnna dh'a rastu n'a bi ka: //🔽ni y'a ma k'a: po ta ba h'a: k'u ba ko gu na briksha gru sgro las //
analyzed: s'am ya tri ka: po ta ba ni kka rnna dh'a rastu n'a bi ka: // ni y'a ma k'a: po ta ba h'a: k'u ba ko gu na briksha gru sgro las //
translated: The oars are the poles, the rudder is the helm.🔽The sails are the wings, the mast is the tree of the ship.

original: mo'o gru dang sgrol byed sgrol //🔽rkyal dang chu dbal 'phyan 'dzin no //
analyzed: mo'o gru dang sgrol byed sgrol // rkyal dang chu dbal 'phyan 'dzin no //
translated: The boat is the raft, the boatman is the ferryman.🔽The oars are the poles, the rudder is the helm.🔽The sails are the wings, the mast is the tree of the ship.

original: rgyun dang rab 'bab 'bab chu'o //
analyzed: rgyun dang rab 'bab 'bab chu'o //
translated: The current, the stream, the river.

original: gru bcas mnyan pa'i gla yin no //
analyzed: gru bcas mnyan pa'i gla yin no //
translated: The boat together with the sailors is the fare.

original: chu klung dang ni shing 'bab chu //
analyzed: chu klung dang ni shing 'bab chu //
translated: The river, the tree, the waterfall.

original: gling gzhan rgyu dang gru yi tshogs //
analyzed: gling gzhan rgyu dang gru yi tshogs //
translated: The other island, the cause, the collection of boats.

original: rlung yor thogs dang gru pa'o //
analyzed: rlung yor thogs dang gru pa'o //
translated: The wind, the sail, the boatman.

original: bya ra ba ni grus 'gro ba //
analyzed: bya ra ba ni grus 'gro ba //
translated: The lookout is the one who goes by boat.

original: steng na yon tan shing las ka: //
analyzed: steng na yon tan shing las ka: //
translated: On it, the tree of qualities.

original: no k'a danda: kshe pa n'i sy'am da ri trangke ni y'a ta ka: //🔽y'a na p'a trantu pont'a bi bha be s'a mu dri yantri shu: //
analyzed: no k'a danda: kshe pa n'i sy'am da ri trangke ni y'a ta ka: // y'a na p'a trantu pont'a bi bha be s'a mu dri yantri shu: //
translated: The rope is the staff, their binding is the cord.🔽The water is the path, the waves are the obstacles.

original: s'a mu dri ko ma nu shyo bdhi dz'a t'a doo noo: s'a mu dri k'a: //
analyzed: s'a mu dri ko ma nu shyo bdhi dz'a t'a doo noo: s'a mu dri k'a: //
translated: The whirlpool is the human bondage, the birth is the whirlpool.

original: kll'i be aardha n'a bam n'a bordhe aa t'i ta noo ke& ti nustri shu //🔽aa bhri: str'i k'ashthakudd'a la: she ka so //
analyzed: kll'i be aardha n'a bam n'a bordhe aa t'i ta noo ke& ti nustri shu // aa bhri: str'i k'ashthakudd'a la: she ka so //
translated: The oars are the arms, the rudder the mind, the water the elements,

original: gru skul dbyug pa 'phen byed yin //🔽gru skya dang ni g-yob byed do //
analyzed: gru skul dbyug pa 'phen byed yin // gru skya dang ni g-yob byed do //
translated: the boat the body, and the helmsman the soul.🔽The oars are the arms, the rudder the mind, the water the elements,🔽the boat the body, and the helmsman the soul.

original: gru yi bzhon pa dang ni gru //
analyzed: gru yi bzhon pa dang ni gru //
translated: The boat is the vehicle, the ship,

original: rgya mtsho'i rdzas dang 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i rdzas dang 'byor pa'o //

analyzed: chu mi dang ni rgya mtsho sa // gru sogs skyes dang gru chung sa //
translated: The waterman is the ocean,🔽the boatman is the boat.

original: sgrol byed gru phyed ma ning ngo //
analyzed: sgrol byed gru phyed ma ning ngo //
translated: The ferryman is the half-boat, the eunuch.

original: bsgral zin gru ni aa ti nu //
analyzed: bsgral zin gru ni aa ti nu //
translated: The crossed boat is the atinuh.

original: shing gi tog tse gru sbyar mo //
analyzed: shing gi tog tse gru sbyar mo //
translated: The wooden bench is the boat-joint.

original: chu gzhong p'a trantu se tsa nam //
analyzed: chu gzhong p'a trantu se tsa nam //
translated: The water-basin is the patrantu-secanam.

original: tri shva g'adh'atpra sanno& tstsha: ka lu sho& natstsha a'a bi la //
analyzed: tri shva g'adh'atpra sanno& tstsha: ka lu sho& natstsha a'a bi la //

analyzed: ni mnangga bh'i ram gambh'i ra mu t'a nam tadbi pa r++ya ye //

analyzed: aa g'a dha ma ta la sya sam ke bartte d'a sa dh'i ba roo /
translated: The elephant is the tala, the fight the dasadhara.

analyzed: mchil pa dang ni nya 'dzin no // spu rings nya dang dzha sha nya //

analyzed: dbung pa byin dang dkar 'bab po //

analyzed: chu bo shi ta brgyar gyes dang // zhags grol bi p'a ta ni mo //

analyzed: sha no gser gyi lag pa yin //

analyzed: dva yo: pra n'a l'i ba ya sa: pa da by'antri shu t'utta roo //

analyzed: de bi k'a y'am sa ra yv'anytsa bha be d'a bi ka s'a ra boo //

analyzed: sy'a du tpa lam ku pa la ya ma tha nri l'am bu dzam k'a be r'i dang 'bab ldan ni // gzhan yang dbye ba chu 'dras 'dres //

original: gnyis pa wa ti chu khang ngo //
analyzed: gnyis pa wa ti chu khang ngo //

original: gsum rnams phyi ma dag la'o //
analyzed: gsum rnams phyi ma dag la'o //

original: lhar bcas rdzing bu'i chu la ni //
analyzed: lhar bcas rdzing bu'i chu la ni //

original: d'a bi ka dang s'a ra bo //
analyzed: d'a bi ka dang s'a ra bo //

analyzed: dri bzangs chu tshim 'phro ba dang // dmar po yi ni mtshams yin no //

analyzed: autpa la dang stobs ngan no //

analyzed: sh'a l'u ka me sh'am kanda: sy'a dw'a ri parnn'a tu kumbhi k'a //

analyzed: dza la n'i l'i tu she b'a lam shee ba lo tha ku mudba t'i //

analyzed: ku mu din+y'a nna lin+y'antu bi shi n'i padmi n'i mu kh'a: //

analyzed: b'a p'um si padmanna li na ma ra binda ma hotpa lam //

analyzed: sa ha sra skyes dang // sngo na aindr'i ba ra dang // dkar na ku mud kee ra be //

analyzed: de rnams rtsa ba sh'a l'u ka //

analyzed: de la sogs pa padma'o //

analyzed: yang na pho ni padma'o //

analyzed: punda r'i kam si t'ambhoo dza ma tha rakta sa re ru he //

analyzed: ze 'bru'i 'phreng ldan rdzing chu 'khrungs //

analyzed: punda r'ika chu skyes dkar //

original: pa ni ba ru ra //
